title: The siege of Rhodes made a representation by the art of prospective in scenes, and the story sung in recitative musick. At the Cock-pit in Drury Lane.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by J.M. for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the Anchor, in the Lower-walk in the New-Exchange,
